mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bill_balance (id, bill_no, bill_name, status,extend_status, balance_type, buyer_no, buyer_name, saler_no, saler_name, brand_no, brand_name, brand_unit_no, brand_unit_name, category_no, category_name, balance_date, balance_start_date, balance_end_date, currency, out_amount, entry_amount, return_amount, deduction_amount, balance_amount, invoice_amount, has_balance_amount, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, auditor, audit_time, remark, out_qty, entry_qty, return_qty, deduction_qty, balance_qty, ask_payment_no, invoice_apply_no, invoice_no, is_user_defined) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{billNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{billName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{extendStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{balanceType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{buyerNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{buyerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salerNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{salerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandUnitNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{brandUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balanceDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{balanceStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{balanceEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{entryAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{returnAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deductionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{balanceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{invoiceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hasBalanceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{entryQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{returnQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deductionQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{balanceQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{askPaymentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceApplyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{isUserDefined,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
UPDATE bill_balance
bill_no = #{billNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
bill_name = #{billName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
extend_status = #{extendStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
balance_type = #{balanceType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
buyer_no = #{buyerNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
buyer_name = #{buyerName,jdbcType=CHAR},
saler_no = #{salerNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
saler_name = #{salerName,jdbcType=CHAR},
brand_no = #{brandNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
brand_name = #{brandName,jdbcType=CHAR},
brand_unit_no = #{brandUnitNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
brand_unit_name = #{brandUnitName,jdbcType=CHAR},
category_no = #{categoryNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=CHAR},
balance_date = #{balanceDate,jdbcType=DATE},
balance_start_date = #{balanceStartDate,jdbcType=DATE},
balance_end_date = #{balanceEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},
currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
out_amount = #{outAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
entry_amount = #{entryAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
return_amount = #{returnAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
deduction_amount = #{deductionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
balance_amount = #{balanceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
invoice_amount = #{invoiceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
has_balance_amount = #{hasBalanceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
auditor = #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
out_qty = #{outQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
entry_qty = #{entryQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
return_qty = #{returnQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deduction_qty = #{deductionQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
balance_qty = #{balanceQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ask_payment_no =#{askPaymentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invoice_apply_no =#{invoiceApplyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invoice_no =#{invoiceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_user_defined =#{isUserDefined,jdbcType=INTEGER}
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

UPDATE bill_balance SET bill_no = #{billNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, bill_name = #{billName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, extend_status = #{extendStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, balance_type = #{balanceType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, buyer_no = #{buyerNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, buyer_name = #{buyerName,jdbcType=CHAR}, saler_no = #{salerNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, saler_name = #{salerName,jdbcType=CHAR}, brand_no = #{brandNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, brand_name = #{brandName,jdbcType=CHAR}, brand_unit_no = #{brandUnitNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, brand_unit_name = #{brandUnitName,jdbcType=CHAR}, category_no = #{categoryNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=CHAR}, balance_date = #{balanceDate,jdbcType=DATE}, balance_start_date = #{balanceStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, balance_end_date = #{balanceEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, out_amount = #{outAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, entry_amount = #{entryAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, return_amount = #{returnAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, deduction_amount = #{deductionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, balance_amount = #{balanceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, invoice_amount = #{invoiceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, has_balance_amount = #{hasBalanceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, auditor = #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, out_qty= #{outQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, entry_qty=#{entryQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, return_qty= #{returnQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deduction_qty= #{deductionQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, balance_qty= #{balanceQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ask_payment_no= #{askPaymentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_apply_no= #{invoiceApplyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_no= #{invoiceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_user_defined =#{isUserDefined,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update bill_balance SET status = #{params.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, extend_status = #{params.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, auditor = #{params.auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_time = #{params.auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE bill_no = #{params.billNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
UPDATE bill_sale_balance SET balance_no = #{params.balanceNo} WHERE 1 = 1 AND bill_type='1371' AND balance_no IS NULL AND id=#{params.id}
UPDATE bill_buy_balance SET balance_no = #{params.balanceNo} WHERE 1 = 1 AND bill_type='1372' AND balance_no IS NULL AND id=#{params.id}
UPDATE bill_sale_balance SET balance_no = NULL WHERE balance_no = #{billNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
UPDATE bill_buy_balance SET balance_no = NULL WHERE balance_no = #{billNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT '合计' BILL_NO, IFNULL(SUM(B.OUT_QTY), 0) OUT_QTY, IFNULL(SUM(B.OUT_AMOUNT), 0) OUT_AMOUNT, IFNULL(SUM(B.BALANCE_AMOUNT), 0) BALANCE_AMOUNT, IFNULL(SUM(B.DEDUCTION_AMOUNT), 0) DEDUCTION_AMOUNT, SUM( CASE WHEN ( B.INVOICE_NO IS NULL OR B.INVOICE_NO = '' ) THEN 0 ELSE B.BALANCE_AMOUNT END ) INVOICE_AMOUNT FROM BILL_BALANCE B WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT saler_no saler_no, saler_name saler_name, buyer_no buyer_no, buyer_name buyer_name,
C.brand_unit_no, C.name brand_unit_name,
SUM(send_qty * cost) out_amount, SUM(receive_qty * cost) entry_amount, SUM(send_qty) out_qty, SUM(receive_qty) entry_qty,
IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(deduction_qty) FROM other_deduction OD LEFT JOIN BRAND B ON B.brand_no = OD.brand_no LEFT JOIN BRAND_UNIT D ON B.sys_no = D.brand_unit_no WHERE 1 = 1 AND OD.balance_no IS NULL AND OD.balance_type='5'
AND OD.saler_no = bill_sale_balance.saler_no AND OD.buyer_no = bill_sale_balance.buyer_no
AND OD.brand_no in (${params.brandNo}) GROUP BY OD.saler_no,OD.buyer_no
AND D.brand_unit_no = C.brand_unit_no GROUP BY OD.saler_no,OD.buyer_no,D.brand_unit_no
), 0 ) deduction_qty,
SUM(send_qty) balance_qty,
IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(deduction_amount) FROM other_deduction OD LEFT JOIN BRAND B ON B.brand_no = OD.brand_no LEFT JOIN BRAND_UNIT D ON B.sys_no = D.brand_unit_no WHERE 1 = 1 AND OD.balance_no IS NULL AND OD.balance_type='5'
AND OD.saler_no = bill_sale_balance.saler_no AND OD.buyer_no = bill_sale_balance.buyer_no
AND OD.brand_no in (${params.brandNo}) GROUP BY OD.saler_no,OD.buyer_no
AND D.brand_unit_no = C.brand_unit_no GROUP BY OD.saler_no,OD.buyer_no,D.brand_unit_no
), 0 ) deduction_amount,
SUM(send_qty * cost) - IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(deduction_amount) FROM other_deduction OD LEFT JOIN BRAND B ON B.brand_no = OD.brand_no LEFT JOIN BRAND_UNIT D ON B.sys_no = D.brand_unit_no WHERE 1 = 1 AND OD.balance_no IS NULL AND OD.balance_type='5'
AND OD.saler_no = bill_sale_balance.saler_no AND OD.buyer_no = bill_sale_balance.buyer_no
AND OD.brand_no in (${params.brandNo}) GROUP BY OD.saler_no,OD.buyer_no
AND D.brand_unit_no = C.brand_unit_no GROUP BY OD.saler_no,OD.buyer_no,D.brand_unit_no
), 0 ) balance_amount FROM BILL_SALE_BALANCE left join brand B on B.brand_no=BILL_SALE_BALANCE.brand_no left join brand_unit C ON B.sys_no = C.brand_unit_no where 1=1 AND balance_no IS NULL AND bill_type=1371
GROUP BY
saler_no,buyer_no
saler_no,buyer_no,brand_unit_no
